nodes.text: Bavo Six was a notoriously powerful yet easy to produce truth serum. It was used by many organizations, from the Bartokk assassins to the Galactic Empire. Bavo Six would induce visual exaggeration and paranoia—shapes and outlines became distorted, and the victim became afraid of everything. The suspected chemical composition of Bavo Six was R7Bo3Kr2, but that has yet to be confirmed.
